Visit Opportunities














Â»
    Visit Opportunities



We hope you and your family are able to visit Chapman, in person or online. A great place to start is with a student-led guided tour. 
You'll be able to see campus and learn more about academic and student life. Click on one of the options to see available dates/times and register:









In-person Guided Tour







Virtual Guided Tour



Load
    More



Schedule a Virtual Fellows Interview
Fellows Interviews are one-on-one appointments between our admission fellows (current students) and first-year applicants. Virtual interviews are conducted via phone or video.Interviews are not required for admission, but are a great way for us to learn more about you, and you to learn about us..
Learn more and schedule >>



View More Visit Opportunities
On our Visit Portal you can find more opportunities to connect with us whether you are in Orange or anywhere around the world!
View Visit Portal >>






Take a Virtual Self-guided Tour



Virtually explore Chapman in this student-led tour through our Orange Campus. You'll be able to visit classrooms, hang-out spots, our residence life area and much more!
About Chapman University








Watch Campus and Community Videos


Campus Housing and Living-Learning Communities
First-year students living on campus are housed in their residence hall's Living-Learning Community, which means they live with other students from their academic school/college/program. Learn more from one of our Resident Advisors!



 
Living in Orange
Learn more about living in the area from current students!

 
Crean Hall Tour
Check out the home of our Crean College of Health & Behavioral Sciences and learn more about academic and research opportunities.

 
Dodge College of Film and Media Arts Tour
See and learn more about all three Dodge College facilities at Chapman University. Ranked as a top film school, these facilities help students bring their creative visions to life.

 
Keck Center of Science and Engineering Tour
The Keck Center is home to the Fowler School of Engineering and Schmid College of Science and Technology, and nearly all STEM undergraduates take classes there. Two Chapman students will show you around:





Ask a Student
Ask us anything! Our students are happy to help you learn more about their major, life at Chapman or what it’s like to be a college student.










Follow Us on Social

Follow us on social to connect with future and current Panthers. We’ll be holding live events, hosting student takeovers and answering your questions.

Instagram
TikTok
Facebook
Twitter

Event Questions

If you have any questions about events or connecting with Chapman students, faculty or staff, contact us at visit@chapman.edu.






Graduate Student Events

Potential graduate students can find opportunities to connect with their program on our Graduate Information Sessions page.


Visit Graduate Information Sessions
